title: Carla Makes Sheet Pan Pizza | From the Test Kitchen | Bon Appétit
description:
Join Carla Music in the Bon Appétit Test Kitchen as she makes a grandma-style sheet pan pizza. If you prefer a spicy pie, use twice as much hot soppressata and none of the sweet type.
Check out the dough recipe here: https://www.bonappetit.com/recipe/grandma-style-pizza-dough
Check out the soppressata pizza recipe here: https://www.bonappetit.com/recipe/hot-and-sweet-soppressata-and-fennel-grandma-pie 

Still haven’t subscribed to Bon Appetit on YouTube? ►► http://bit.ly/1TLeyPn

ABOUT BON APPÉTIT
